skills.name: CORRUPTION
desc: • Deals one hit of physical, magic, and true damage to all enemies.
• Transform Invincibility effects into Perfect Corruption for 2 turns.

skills.name: SECOND COMING
desc: • Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver effects from all allies.
• 35% Chance to grant an Extra Turn to each ally.

skills.name: CALAMITY
desc: Grant Immunity to Permadeath, Perfect Death, Block Beneficial, and Perfect Corruption to all allies. Deal 500% of a random enemy’s MAX HP as true damage and heal all allies to full HP when an ally dies. Remove all beneficial effects, including Golden Effects,inflict Punishment and Perfect Death for the duration of battle on all enemies, and Revive with full HP and a Perfect Titan Shield upon death.
